trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration settings that control the key generation and algorithms that are used in encryption, decryption, and message authentication code (MAC) operations in Windows Forms authentication, view-state validation, and session-state application isolation.
trans-unit.target: 定义控制密钥生成和算法的配置设置，这些密钥生成和算法在 Windows Forms 身份验证、视图状态验证和会话状态应用程序隔离中用于加密、解密和消息身份验证代码 (MAC) 操作。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `MachineKey` section in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改的内容`MachineKey`配置文件中的部分。

trans-unit.source: The `MachineKey` section can be configured at the machine (Machine.config) or application (Web.config) level and controls the keys and algorithms that are used for Windows Forms authentication, view-state validation, and session-state application isolation.
trans-unit.target: `MachineKey`部分可以在计算机 (Machine.config) 或应用程序 (Web.config) 级别配置和控制密钥和算法，可用于 Windows 窗体身份验证、 视图状态验证和会话状态应用程序隔离。

trans-unit.source: For any of these features to work across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), the `DecryptionKey` and `ValidationKey` attributes of the `MachineKey` section must be configured explicitly and identically with valid key values.
trans-unit.target: 若要在网络中 Web 服务器 （Web 场），这些功能的任何`DecryptionKey`和`ValidationKey`属性`MachineKey`部分必须显式并一致地使用配置有效的密钥值。

trans-unit.source: The `AutoGenerate` value does not work for Web farms, because it relies on a cryptographically random secret, which is persisted using machine-local protection and will not be the same across more than one computer.
trans-unit.target: `AutoGenerate`值不适用于 Web 场，因为它依赖于密码随机密钥，它将保留使用计算机本地保护，并将不能跨多台计算机相同。

trans-unit.source: The example in this section demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the section, which can also be accessed as members of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class.
trans-unit.target: 本部分中的示例演示如何以声明方式为部分中，还可作为成员的访问的几个特性指定值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example from a configuration file shows how to specify values declaratively for the section.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的以下示例演示如何指定部分以声明方式的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class in code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>在代码中的类。

trans-unit.source: If you to specify keys in this configuration section, as is required in Web-farm scenarios, it is recommended that you encrypt this section by using protected configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果你指定此配置节中的键为需要在 Web 场方案中，建议使用受保护的配置加密此节。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection" /> class by using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认设置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>类通过<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set if you set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置此属性，如果设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The property value is passed to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> factory method.
trans-unit.target: 属性值传递给<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether upgraded encryption methods for view state that were introduced after the .NET Framework version 2.0 Service Pack 1 release are used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定视图状态的升级加密方法是否在使用 .NET Framework 2.0 版 Service Pack 1 发行版后引入。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether encryption methods that were introduced after the .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 release are used.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示是否在使用 .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 发行版后引入的加密方法的值。

trans-unit.source: The upgraded encryption methods in later versions of the .NET Framework reduce the risk that an attacker can successfully reverse-engineer the `DecryptionKey` value.
trans-unit.target: 更高版本的.NET Framework 中的升级的加密方法降低攻击者可以成功地风险反向工程处理`DecryptionKey`值。

trans-unit.source: The older encryption methods are available in order to maintain backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 为了保持向后兼容有较旧的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: All servers in a Web farm should have the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A> property set to the same value.
trans-unit.target: Web 场中的所有服务器都应都具有<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A>属性设置为相同的值。

trans-unit.source: If the server that reads a forms authentication ticket has a different <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A> setting than the server that created the ticket, the ticket won't be recognized.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取窗体身份验证票证的服务器具有不同<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A>设置比票证创建的服务器，就不会识别该票证。

trans-unit.source: The following values can be specified for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A> property:
trans-unit.target: 可以为指定以下值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A>属性：

trans-unit.source: `Framework20SP1`.
trans-unit.target: `Framework20SP1`。

trans-unit.source: This value specifies that ASP.NET uses encryption methods that were available in versions of ASP.NET earlier than 2.0 SP2.
trans-unit.target: 此值指定 ASP.NET 使用可用在的 ASP.NET 版本 2.0 SP2 之前的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this value for all servers in a web farm if any server has a version of the .NET Framework earlier than 2.0 SP2.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何服务器具有早于 2.0 SP2 的.NET framework 版本的 web 场中的所有服务器使用此值。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value unless the application Web.config file has the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element set to "4.5".
trans-unit.target: 这是默认值，除非该应用程序 Web.config 文件具有`targetFramework`属性`httpRuntime`元素设置为"4.5"。

trans-unit.source: `Framework20SP2`.
trans-unit.target: `Framework20SP2`。

trans-unit.source: This value specifies that ASP.NET uses upgraded encryption methods that were introduced in the .NET Framework 2.0 SP2.
trans-unit.target: 此值指定 ASP.NET 使用.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 中引入的升级的加密方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this value for all servers in a web farm if all servers have the .NET Framework 2.0 SP2 or later but at least one does not have the .NET Framework 4.5.
trans-unit.target: 此值用于 web 场中所有服务器，如果所有服务器都具有.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 或更高版本，但至少一个不都是.NET Framework 4.5。

trans-unit.source: `Framework45`.
trans-unit.target: `Framework45`。

trans-unit.source: Cryptographic enhancements for ASP.NET 4.5 are in effect.
trans-unit.target: 实际上是为 ASP.NET 4.5 加密增强功能。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value if the application Web.config file has the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element set to "4.5".
trans-unit.target: 这是默认值，如果应用程序 Web.config 文件具有`targetFramework`属性`httpRuntime`元素设置为"4.5"。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `Framework45`, the following restrictions are in effect:
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`Framework45`，以下限制已生效：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A> property has a value, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ApplicationName%2A> property must also have a value.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DataProtectorType%2A> 属性有值，则 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ApplicationName%2A> 属性必须有值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector> class mandates that a non-empty application name be provided.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector>类要求提供一个非空应用程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A> attribute must be an actual validation algorithm (for example, MD5, SHA1, HMACSHA256, HMACSHA384, HMACSHA512) or a custom algorithm that subclasses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A>属性必须是实际的验证算法 （例如，MD5、 SHA1、 HMACSHA256、 HMACSHA384、 HMACSHA512） 或自定义算法该子类<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>类型。

trans-unit.source: The values AES and 3DES are forbidden.
trans-unit.target: 禁止 AES 和 3DES 的值。

trans-unit.source: The framework will not produce signed-only payloads.
trans-unit.target: 框架将不会生成仅用于签名的有效负载。

trans-unit.source: Forms authentication tickets will always be both encrypted and signed, regardless of how the `protection` attribute of the `forms` element is set in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 窗体身份验证票证将始终被同时加密并签名，而不考虑如何`protection`属性`forms`元素设置的 Web.config 文件中。

trans-unit.source: View state will always be both encrypted and signed if either `EnableViewStateMac` or `RequireViewStateEncryption` is set for a given page.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态将始终进行同时加密或签名如果`EnableViewStateMac`或`RequireViewStateEncryption`为给定页设置。

trans-unit.source: As a result of the security update that is described in [Microsoft security bulletin MS10-070](http://technet.microsoft.com/security/bulletin/MS10-070), the default encryption behavior is the same for the `Framework20SP1` and `Framework20SP2` settings.
trans-unit.target: 由于中所述的安全更新[Microsoft 安全公告 MS10-070](http://technet.microsoft.com/security/bulletin/MS10-070)，默认加密行为是相同的`Framework20SP1`和`Framework20SP2`设置。

trans-unit.source: Changing the default behavior is not recommended, but if you want to do that, see [How to configure legacy encryption mode in ASP.NET](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2425938).
trans-unit.target: 默认行为不建议更改，但如果你想要执行此操作，请参阅[如何在 ASP.NET 中配置旧加密模式](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2425938)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data protector type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据保护器类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data protector type.
trans-unit.target: 数据保护器类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: To specify custom data protection algorithms for ASP.NET, set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45> and set this property to a string that represents a class that derives from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 ASP.NET 自定义的数据保护算法，请设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45>并将此属性设置为一个字符串，表示派生自的类<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector>类。

trans-unit.source: This string corresponds to the `providerClass` parameter that is passed to the static <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> factory method.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串对应于`providerClass`参数传递给静态<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DataProtector.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>工厂方法。

trans-unit.source: The class you specify is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods even if you do not specify the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45> option.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用你指定的类<xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法即使未指定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45>选项。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性，则还必须设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ApplicationName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the encryption algorithm that is used for encrypting and decrypting forms authentication data.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于加密和解密 Forms 身份验证数据的加密算法。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the algorithm that is used to encrypt and decrypt forms authentication data.
trans-unit.target: 指示用于加密和解密 Forms 身份验证数据的算法的值。

trans-unit.source: (For information about how to specify the algorithm that is used when view state is encrypted, see the <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation" /> property.) <see langword="Auto" /> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: （有关如何指定视图状态加密时所使用算法的信息，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation" /> 属性。）<see langword="Auto" /> 是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Decryption%2A> property supports the following decryption values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Decryption%2A>属性支持以下的解密值：

trans-unit.source: `Auto`, which is the default value, specifies that ASP.NET determines which encryption algorithm to use based on configuration default settings.
trans-unit.target: `Auto`这是默认值，指定 ASP.NET 确定要使用的加密算法基于配置默认设置。

trans-unit.source: `AES`, which specifies that ASP.NET uses the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.AES> algorithm to encrypt data.
trans-unit.target: `AES`它指定 ASP.NET 使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.AES>算法来加密数据。

trans-unit.source: `AES` is the default algorithm to encrypt data.
trans-unit.target: `AES` 是默认的算法来加密数据。

trans-unit.source: `3DES`, which specifies that ASP.NET uses the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.TripleDES> algorithm to encrypt data.
trans-unit.target: `3DES`它指定 ASP.NET 使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.TripleDES>算法来加密数据。

trans-unit.source: A custom algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 自定义算法中。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set declaratively in the `decryption` attribute of the element of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 通常以声明方式设置此属性`decryption`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the element.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅元素。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is not one of the decryption values.
trans-unit.target: 所选值不是解密值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key that is used to encrypt and decrypt data, or the process by which the key is generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来加密和解密数据的密钥，或生成密钥的过程。

trans-unit.source: A key value, or a value that indicates how the key is generated.
trans-unit.target: 密钥值或指示如何生成密钥的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is "AutoGenerate,IsolateApps".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“AutoGenerate,IsolateApps”。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A> property is used for encryption and decryption, such as in Windows Forms authentication, and for view state when the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A> property is set to "3DES" or "AES".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A>属性用于加密和解密，例如在 Windows 窗体身份验证和视图状态时<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A>属性设置为"3DES"或"AES"。

trans-unit.source: Use the "AutoGenerate" option to specify that ASP.NET generates a random key and stores it in the Local Security Authority.
trans-unit.target: "自动生成"选项用于指定 ASP.NET 生成一个随机密钥，并将其存储在本地安全机构。

trans-unit.source: The "AutoGenerate" option is part of the default value.
trans-unit.target: "自动生成"选项是默认值的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If you add the "IsolateApps" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppVirtualPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果将"IsolateApps"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppVirtualPath%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is the default setting.
trans-unit.target: 此为默认设置。

trans-unit.source: If you add the "IsolateByAppId" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果将"IsolateByAppId"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If two distinct applications share a virtual path (perhaps because those applications are running on different ports), this flag can be used to further distinguish them from one another.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个不同的应用程序共享的虚拟路径 (可能是因为这些应用程序正在运行在不同的端口上)，此标志可以用于进一步将它们与另一个区分开来。

trans-unit.source: The "IsolateByAppId" flag is understood only by ASP.NET 4.5, but it can be used regardless of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode?displayProperty=nameWithType> setting.
trans-unit.target: "IsolateByAppId"标志理解只能由 ASP.NET 4.5，但它可而不考虑<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置。

trans-unit.source: If you need to support configuration across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A> property manually to ensure consistent configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要支持多个 Web 服务器 （Web 场） 的网络配置，设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A>属性手动来确保一致的配置。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to manually generate values for the `DecryptionKey` attribute, see [How To: Configure MachineKey in ASP.NET 2.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何手动生成的值信息`DecryptionKey`属性，请参阅[How To： 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中配置 MachineKey](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113)。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set declaratively in the `DecryptionKey` attribute of the element of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 通常以声明方式设置此属性`DecryptionKey`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the element.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A> property by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey%2A>通过使用代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hashing algorithm that is used for validating forms authentication and view state data.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the hashing algorithm that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data.
trans-unit.target: 指示用于验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的哈希算法的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A> property supports encryption algorithms that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A>属性支持加密算法定义的<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation>枚举。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set declaratively in the `decryption` attribute of the element of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 通常以声明方式设置此属性`decryption`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the element.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A> property by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A>通过使用代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a custom algorithm that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示用于验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的自定义算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of a predefined algorithm or the name of a custom algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含预定义算法的名称或自定义算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The predefined algorithms that are available are defined by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 可用的预定义的算法由定义<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation>枚举。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a custom algorithm, you do not have to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用自定义算法，你不需要设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A> property the to the name of the custom algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A>属性到自定义算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: When you do that, this property will automatically be set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: 当你这样做时，此属性将自动设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.Custom>。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationAlgorithm%2A> property declaratively in the Web.config file or programmatically in code.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationAlgorithm%2A>属性以声明方式在 Web.config 文件中或以编程方式在代码中。

trans-unit.source: To set this property declaratively, you use the `validationAlgorithm` attribute of the element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 若要以声明方式设置此属性，请使用`validationAlgorithm`的配置文件中的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute can be set to the name of a predefined algorithm or of a custom algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为预定义算法或自定义算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The predefined algorithms are defined by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 由定义的预定义的算法<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Custom algorithms are specified in the `validationAlgorithm` attribute by using the "alg:" prefix followed by the name of the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 中指定自定义算法`validationAlgorithm`属性通过使用"alg:"前缀跟算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: If you use this format to specify a custom algorithm, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.Custom> and this property is set to the name that follows the "alg:" prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用此格式指定自定义算法，<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.Custom>此属性设置为跟的名称和"alg:"前缀。

trans-unit.source: To set this property programmatically, use the value of one of the predefined algorithms that are defined by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation> enumeration, or set this property to a custom algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式设置此属性，使用一个由定义的预定义算法的值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation>枚举，或将此属性设置为自定义算法名称。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to the name of a custom algorithm, set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置自定义算法的名称，设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.Validation%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyValidation.Custom>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data, or the process by which the key is generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置键，用来验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的代码，或生成密钥的过程。

trans-unit.source: A key value, or a value that indicates how the key is generated.
trans-unit.target: 密钥值或指示如何生成密钥的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is "AutoGenerate,IsolateApps".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“AutoGenerate,IsolateApps”。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property is used when `enableViewStateMAC` is `true` to create a message authentication code (MAC) to enable ASP.NET to determine whether view state has been tampered with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>使用属性时`enableViewStateMAC`是`true`创建消息验证代码 (MAC)，以使 ASP.NET 可以确定视图状态是否已被篡改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property is also used to generate out-of-process, application-specific session IDs to ensure that session state variables are isolated between applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>属性还用于生成进程外，应用程序特定的会话 Id，以确保该会话状态变量之间是相互隔离应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Use the "AutoGenerate" option to specify that ASP.NET generates a random key and stores it in the Local Security Authority.
trans-unit.target: "自动生成"选项用于指定 ASP.NET 生成一个随机密钥，并将其存储在本地安全机构。

trans-unit.source: The "AutoGenerate" option is part of the default value.
trans-unit.target: "自动生成"选项是默认值的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If you add the "IsolateApps" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppVirtualPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果将"IsolateApps"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppVirtualPath%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is the default setting.
trans-unit.target: 此为默认设置。

trans-unit.source: If you add the "IsolateByAppId" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果将"IsolateByAppId"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If two distinct applications share a virtual path (perhaps because those applications are running on different ports), this flag can be used to further distinguish them from one another.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个不同的应用程序共享的虚拟路径 (可能是因为这些应用程序正在运行在不同的端口上)，此标志可以用于进一步将它们与另一个区分开来。

trans-unit.source: The "IsolateByAppId" flag is understood only by ASP.NET 4.5, but it can be used regardless of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode?displayProperty=nameWithType> setting.
trans-unit.target: "IsolateByAppId"标志理解只能由 ASP.NET 4.5，但它可而不考虑<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置。

trans-unit.source: If you need to support configuration across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property manually to ensure consistent configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要支持多个 Web 服务器 （Web 场） 的网络配置，设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>属性手动来确保一致的配置。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to manually generate values for the `DecryptionKey` attribute, see [How To: Configure MachineKey in ASP.NET 2.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何手动生成的值信息`DecryptionKey`属性，请参阅[How To： 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中配置 MachineKey](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113)。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set declaratively in the `validationKey` attribute of the element of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 通常以声明方式设置此属性`validationKey`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A> property by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey%2A>通过使用代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection>类。
